Entry.JapaneseText: <Dio>
Entry.EnglishText: <Dio>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Rondoline>
Entry.EnglishText: <Rondoline>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Chester>
Entry.EnglishText: <Chester>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Cless>
Entry.EnglishText: <Cless>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mint>
Entry.EnglishText: <Mint>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mel>
Entry.EnglishText: <Mel>

Entry.JapaneseText: エトス
Entry.EnglishText: Ethos

Entry.JapaneseText: Variable
Entry.EnglishText: Variable

Entry.JapaneseText: ……今の…… 無理して戦わなくても、 逃げられたんじゃ？
Entry.EnglishText: Just now...Wasn't that fight kinda silly? I mean we could have just walked past him.

Entry.JapaneseText: 先手必勝。 先にぶっ叩いた方が勝ちかな
Entry.EnglishText: The early bird gets the worm! Attack before they can make a move and you'll win!

Entry.JapaneseText: にしては、ダオスに対しては ずいぶん、おくてだな？
Entry.EnglishText: That pretty much sums up how Dhaos' plans worked.

Entry.JapaneseText: それはあいつの方だよ
Entry.EnglishText: That's the way he chose to do things.

Entry.JapaneseText: あのバカ……私が近づくたびに、 あちこち飛ばしてくれちゃって
Entry.EnglishText: That i<Dio>t... Each and every time I get close to him he sends me to a different ti<Mel>ine.

Entry.JapaneseText: オレには<Rody>がダオスと 会わずにすんで、ほっと してるふうにも見えるぜ
Entry.EnglishText: I think it's a relief you didn't have to meet the guy in person, all said.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……かもね。 怖い相手と戦わずに 済んでほっとしてんだ
Entry.EnglishText: ...Maybe. I was afraid of getting dragged into a fight with him back then. I'm relieved for that.

Entry.JapaneseText: ふーん……
Entry.EnglishText: Hmmm...

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、それでも君は ダオスを追っているんだね
Entry.EnglishText: And yet you insist on chasing after Dhaos. Why?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……心残りなんだよ、まだ
Entry.EnglishText: ...It's a swelling in my heart I can't get rid of.

Entry.JapaneseText: 英雄になりそこねたからか？
Entry.EnglishText: You mean you want to become a hero?

Entry.JapaneseText: ま、そういうことかな？
Entry.EnglishText: Ah, I guess that could be it!

Entry.JapaneseText: 『英雄』か……
Entry.EnglishText: A hero, huh...

Entry.JapaneseText: 少なくとも今の僕は、 そんな立派なものじゃないよ
Entry.EnglishText: At least now I can see it's not a title full of grandeur.

Entry.JapaneseText: 世界を守りたいって気持ちも もちろんあった
Entry.EnglishText: Sure, we protected the world. That is a certainty.

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、僕を突き動かしてたのは ただの復讐心だったんだから
Entry.EnglishText: But when I try to pin down a motive of why I did the things as I did... it all boils down to revenge for my parents.

Entry.JapaneseText: 私も…… <Cless>さんと同じです
Entry.EnglishText: I feel the same as <Cless>.

Entry.JapaneseText: 私も……母を ダオスに殺された のですから……
Entry.EnglishText: After all, it was due to Dhaos my dear mother got slaughtered.

Entry.JapaneseText: 『英雄』とか『時空戦士』とか そんな呼び名が時々、重荷なんだ
Entry.EnglishText: Being called a "Hero" or an "Eternal Hero" sometimes can be a heavy burden to carry.

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、僕たちは、 みんなのその呼び声に 応えなくちゃいけない……
Entry.EnglishText: And yet people throw these words around so easily. Even when we don't live up to their expectative...

Entry.JapaneseText: だから、利用されてんの知ってて 騎士団を手伝ってんのか？
Entry.EnglishText: Is that why you offered to help in the Imperial Knights?

Entry.JapaneseText: 利用しているのは、 僕も同じだよ
Entry.EnglishText: I offer my help since I'm no different from them.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Cless>さんも？
Entry.EnglishText: You're the same as them?

Entry.JapaneseText: 僕は『英雄』と呼ばれるに ふさわしい自分になるため、 彼らを利用してる
Entry.EnglishText: I felt a need to justify being called a "hero" of any sorts. To live up I feel I have to help those in need.

Entry.JapaneseText: まったく、<Cless>も<Mint>も 真面目すぎるぜ
Entry.EnglishText: Damn, you two sure beat your heads for things you can't help, huh?

Entry.JapaneseText: 期待したい奴には勝手に させとけばいいんだ
Entry.EnglishText: Don't put yourself through hell just cuz others expect much from you.

Entry.JapaneseText: オレ……<Cless>さんも <Mint>さんもがんばって 『英雄』やらなくてもいいと思う
Entry.EnglishText: I think that... it's okay since Mister <Cless> and Miss <Mint> are trying hard to be "heroes."

Entry.JapaneseText: <Dio>……
いや、違うかな…… 今のふたりが、 嘘かマジかわかんねし
Entry.EnglishText: No that came off wrong... It's a lie if I just said you were like I expected you to.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……でも、なんか あんまがんばんなくても、 ふたりはその……
Entry.EnglishText: But you are trying so hard! So if you keep trying you'll...um...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……あぁっ！ なんかうまく言えねー！
Entry.EnglishText: Gah! This is really hard to say!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Dio>は自然体のままの ふたりでも十分魅力的って 言いたいんだよね？
Entry.EnglishText: I think <Dio>'s trying to say in his own way both of you are fascinating persons as is. Right, <Dio>?

Entry.JapaneseText: うぉっ…… 今のでわかったのか
Entry.EnglishText: Woah... She picked up that mess pretty well.

Entry.JapaneseText: わたしも……そう思います
Entry.EnglishText: I feel the same as <Dio>.

Entry.JapaneseText: だって、<Red>トーティス村<White>の 皆さん、おふたりのこと 大好きみたいでしたから
Entry.EnglishText: I think that's why everyone in Toltus loves you two!

Entry.JapaneseText: ま、なんにしてもだ。 ふたりとも片意地 張りすぎなんだよ
Entry.EnglishText: Ah, even if we tell you this you'll still go and be stubborn won't you?

Entry.JapaneseText: そんなに難しく 考えなくたって いいと思うぜ？
Entry.EnglishText: Just stop thinking hard about things we can't change, okay?

Entry.JapaneseText: 君はちょい難しく 考えたほうがいいんじゃない？
Entry.EnglishText: That's quite a fitting comment coming from our thoughtful <Chester>, right?

Entry.JapaneseText: どういう意味だよ！
Entry.EnglishText: What's that supposed to mean!?

Entry.JapaneseText: あ！ オ、オレ、なんか <Cless>さんに 偉そうなこと言っちゃった？
Entry.EnglishText: U-um. I'm sorry if I offended you Mister <Cless> if I said anything inappropriate.

Entry.JapaneseText: いや、ありがとう、<Dio>。 <Mel>も、それに<Chester>も
Entry.EnglishText: No offense taken at all. Thank you deeply, <Dio>. And <Mel> and <Chester>.

Entry.JapaneseText: さ、先に進もう
Entry.EnglishText: Then, let's get a move on.
